title: M41-K0 "Mai"
textPreview: Blackholes innately absorb those around them, yet this fact was ignored by her and her sister both due to time passing by where nothing happened, as well as their familial bonds being too strong as they were born as twin blackholes. Eventually she absorbed her twin, causing the Great Apocalypse and years of mourning.

content.text: Blackholes innately absorb those around them, yet this fact was ignored by her and her sister both due to time passing by where nothing happened, as well as their familial bonds being too strong as they were born as twin blackholes. Eventually she absorbed her twin, causing the Great Apocalypse and years of mourning.
Invent new death and an afterlife, to keep the essence of life even after death.

As a god, she is generally non-intrusive to the general inhabitants of her world (aside from some of her chosen). As god of invention and longevity, she strives to find ways to improve the overall "system" of her universe

Her chosen are either in great suffering or enjoy long prosperous lives, regardless of how much she favors them. They are seen as tools and will be used as tools and are appreciated for their efficiency.

stats.label: Hair color
stats.value: Dark Blue to Neon Blue to Neon Green to Neon Yellow
